lead_paragraph: Torey Krug had a goal and two assists, Brad Marchand and Loui Eriksson each added a goal and assist, and the Boston Bruins kept their playoff hopes alive with a 5-1 win over the Detroit Red Wings on Thursday night.

headline.print_headline: Bruins' Playoffs Hopes Live on With 5-1 Win Over Red Wings
headline.main: Bruins' Playoffs Hopes Live on With 5-1 Win Over Red Wings
